stories.title: Repo has required files: package.json, README.md, .github/workflows/loop.yml
bun run loop executes the healing loop with deja memory
Push to main triggers loop.yml workflow that heals until complete
.gateproof/PAUSED file stops the loop, deleting it resumes
Repo can heal itself: intentionally break something, loop fixes it
src/greeting.ts exports a greet(name) function that returns 'Hello, {name}!'
